name: Dethrone the No. 100
description:
You are number 0. Defeat all the enemies until their maximum leader deigns to appear to defeat him and become the new boss.

Improve your skills as you progress through the rooms and find ways to counter the enemy's abilities.

This game is made to play against your Twitch chat, where the viewers will make the opponent's decisions. However, you can also play in offline mode.

Controls: 

- WASD / Arrows (Move)

- Mouse (Aim & shoot)

- Shift (Run, requires ability)

Assets:

- Art (Wallpapers): Dall-E mini

- Art (Spell icons): 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/free-rpg-fantasy-spell-icons-...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/spellbook-preface-111069

Sound, VFX & Room design: Not found.
